claimFees(address,address[]).details: Caller needs to pay the PAYMENT_AMOUNT of PAYOUT_TOKEN tokens.This function is NOT implementing slippage protection. Caller has to check that received amounts match the minimum expected.

params.feeTokens: The addresses of the fee token to collect to the recipient.
params.recipient: The address to which collected dapp fees will be transferred.

donate(uint256).details: The dapp fee ERC20 token MUST be the payoutToken.The amount must be at least payoutAmount to notify the reward receiver.

params.amount: the amount of fee token to directly send to the reward receiver.

payoutAmount().details: This works as first come first serve basis. whoever pays this much amount of the payout amount first will get the fees.

params._newPayoutAmount: The value that will be the new payout amount.

queuedPayoutAmount().details: It becomes the payout amount after the next claim.

claimFees(address,address[]).notice: Claim collected dapp fees and transfer them to the recipient.

donate(uint256).notice: directly sends dapp fees from msg.sender to the BGTStaker reward receiver.

pause().notice: Allows the pauser to pause the collector.

payoutAmount().notice: The amount of payout token that is required to claim dapp fees of a particular token.

payoutToken().notice: The ERC-20 token which must be used to pay for fees when claiming dapp fees.

queuePayoutAmountChange(uint256).notice: Queues a new payout amount. Must be called by admin.Update the payout amount to a new value. Must be called by admin.

queuedPayoutAmount().notice: The amount of payout token that is queued to be set as the payout amount.

rewardReceiver().notice: The contract that receives the payout and is notified via method call, when dapp fees are claimed.

unpause().notice: Allows the manager to unpause the collector.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when the admin queues the payout amount.

@notice Emitted when the payout amount is updated.
 @notice Emitted when the admin updates the payout amount.
@notice The ERC-20 token which must be used to pay for fees when claiming dapp fees.

@notice The amount of payout token that is queued to be set as the payout amount.
 @dev It becomes the payout amount after the next claim.
@notice The contract that receives the payout and is notified via method call, when dapp fees are claimed.
@notice Allows the pauser to pause the collector.
@notice Allows the manager to unpause the collector.
